CATEGORY.command: /usr/sbin/swap -l|awk '{TOT+=$4} {FREE+=$5} END {print "total: "TOT " used: " TOT-FREE}';/usr/sbin/prtconf|grep Memory;vmstat 1 3;kstat zfs:0:arcstats:size | grep size|tr -s ' ' ''|tr -s '\t' '^'

CATEGORY.command: iostat -Dl -a -T -s -R 1 1 | grep -E 'fcs|Physical|sissas' | awk '{print $1, $2, $3, $4, $5}'; iostat -d | grep -E '^ *hdisk' | awk '{print $1, $3, $4, $5, $6}';echo '-----DISK_EXTENDED_STATS-----'; iostat -Dl 3 1 |grep -i hdisk |awk '{print $1,$2,$24}'
CATEGORY.description: monitors system input/output device load.
Shows how long the system has been up.

PROCESS.description: The status of the process running in the machine.

CATEGORY.description: Zombie Process count

CATEGORY.command: LANG=C netstat -nat | awk '{print $6}' | sort | uniq -c | sort -n

LANG=C netstat -v | grep -E 'ETHERNET STATISTICS|Transmit Errors|Packets Dropped|Current S/W\+H/W Transmit Queue Length|CRC Errors|Alignment Errors|DMA Overrun|Bytes:|Logical Port Link State|Physical Port Link State'

for i in $(lsdev -Cc adapter | grep -i fcs | awk '{print $1}'); do fscsi_adapter="fscsi${i#${i%?}}"; echo "FCS_Adapter $i"; status=$(lsdev -Cc adapter | grep -i fcs | awk 'NR==2{print $2}'); echo "STATUS $status";echo "FSCSI_Adapter $fscsi_adapter"; lsattr -El "${fscsi_adapter}" | awk '{print $1, $2}'; echo "##END##";done
errpt -s "$(perl -e 'use POSIX qw(strftime); print strftime("%m%d%H%M%y", localtime(time - 24*60*60));')" -e "$(perl -e 'use POSIX qw(strftime); print strftime("%m%d%H%M%y", localtime(time));')"
lparstat -i | grep -i "Desired Virtual CPUs" && lparstat -i | grep -i "Entitled Capacity " && lparstat -i | grep -i "Type "
lssrc -a | awk '{ if ($4 == "" && $3 == "") {print $1, $2;} else if ($4 == "") {print $1, $3;} else {print $1, $4;}}'
services="#Services List#"; for service in $services; do sudo startsrc -s $service; done
services="#Services List#"; for service in $services; do sudo stopsrc -s $service; done
services="#Services List#"; for service in $services; do sudo stopsrc -s $service; sudo startsrc -s $service; done
for service in #Services List#; do lssrc -a | grep $service| awk '{print $1, $4, $3}'; done

CATEGORY.description: Percentage of CPU used is monitored periodically and displayed.
Available total memory.
Available total memory.

CATEGORY.command: export UNIX95=1;export TERM=xterm;/usr/sbin/kmtune -q vps_pagesize | tail -1 | tr -s " " "\t"
